name: iMagine
tagline: iMagine is being rebooted this summer!
body:
Welcome to the iMagine open source repository!  iMagine is inspired by [Magi Nation](http://magination.wikia.com/wiki/Magi-Nation_(TV_Series)), a Canadian anime broadcast in 2007 and 2010.  The show involves the Final Dreamers Tony, Strag, and Edyn facing off against Agram and his Shadow Magi in a quest to gain all of the Dreamstones in order to lock Agram in his domain, called the Core, forever!

Binaries:
[Version 0.1 (stable)](http://iggyvolz.github.io/iMagine/game.html)
[Bleeding Edge](http://iggyvolz.github.io/iMagine/bleeding.html) ([tests](http://iggyvolz.github.io/iMagine/test.html))
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
